Articles.Content:
hey guy's this is my third version of the turbocat (i got new inspiration from clown_baby version) and a the cyclontron.

this time it has a cargobay that opens and a gun that lowers from behind the copit and of course the three engine's that move down for vtol mod.

the cargobay doors are based of clown_baby's vtol engine design for his F35, the move up as the open for more ground clearance.

i redesigned the copit, it now looks more like the cartoon (and a real f15).

the hull is made of long beams.

the landing gear now disappears in to the hull for a smooth look (i love clipping)

i now use a docking washer for the wing movement (de wings now flap les)

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ _______________________________________

pic's:

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ _______________________________________

video

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ _______________________________________

flying:

the plane has asas but you fly and vtol with out it.

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ___

mods used:

Magic Smoke Industries - Infernal Robotics:

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods...

B9 pack:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/...

the gun

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/42189-0-22-GatlingGun-mod

kerbal paint mod

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-(September-23rd)-(Same-Old-Still-Works!)

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ___

toggle's:

1 the outermost engine's

2 the inner engine (and vtol engine)

3 the airintake engine's

4 and 5 move's the vtol engine's

6 and 7 move's the wings

8 and 9 open's the cargobay

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ___

__________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ __________________________________________________ ___

hope you guys like the plane and if you want use some part of the plane go right a head.

Edited June 11, 2014 by soulreaver1981
Holy crap. You've practically perfected it. I'm significantly impressed.

Holy crap. You've practically perfected it. I'm significantly impressed.

thanks, its just to bad you cant collor some part's with the kerbal paint mod.

it would look so cool
this definitely looks more like the cartoon than mine, and you did build it first. But I hate losing, so be ready for the greatest turbokat this world has ever known

Your links to the mods are broken. Other than that, nice job!

Can the Cyclotron deploy while the plane is under power?

Your links to the mods are broken. Other than that, nice job!

Can the Cyclotron deploy while the plane is under power?

no its to big for the cargobay.

i'm trying to make a smaller one

ps de gun mod link now works, the rest appear to work
